This is my post on ThoughtWorks Insights on Architecting for Continuous Delivery

[Best of 2016] What is the real essence of #ContinuousDelivery? @vishalmanohar explains here https://t.co/RWkR6BUlYA pic.twitter.com/IZQxZWM1dI

frontmatter.description: Continuous Delivery is not just about selecting the right tools. The application should also be architected in a way to make it effective.
frontmatter.title: Architecting For Continuous Delivery
